macro_markets.query: What are the most important macroeconomic and stock market news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major index movements, Fed/central bank news, and significant company earnings or announcements.

items.title: US Major Indices Hit Record Highs on Friday
items.summary: The Dow Jones closed above 47,000 for the first time, up 1%, while S&P 500 rose 0.8% and Nasdaq gained 1.2%, driven by cooler inflation data and US-China trade optimism ahead of Fed decisions and tech earnings.

items.title: US-China Trade Negotiators Reach Framework Deal
items.summary: US and Chinese officials agreed on a trade framework over the weekend, paving the way for a Trump-Xi meeting in South Korea, boosting market sentiment amid record stock highs.

items.title: Fed Chair Powell's Remarks in Focus This Week
items.summary: Markets await Jerome Powell's comments on monetary policy amid record highs, strong sentiment, and challenges from government shutdown impacting job data.

items.title: Peter Brandt Predicts Bitcoin Drop to $58K-$62K
items.summary: Veteran trader Peter Brandt forecasts a 33-37% Bitcoin correction to $58,000–$62,000 based on a rising wedge pattern, amid bearish signals.

items.title: Ethereum Faces Heavy Liquidations Amid Risk-Off Mood
items.summary: Ethereum saw $27.09 million in liquidations as crypto markets struggled, with retail sentiment turning bearish; other coins like Solana and Dogecoin also hit by liquidations.

items.title: Kotak Bank Stock Shows Modest Gains
items.summary: Kotak Bank's shares traded at Rs 429.50, up 0.61% daily and 0.82% weekly, despite negative monthly returns.

items.title: Fiserv Stock Declines 0.73%
items.summary: Fiserv closed at 66.29 on January 19, down 0.73% with volume of 8.29 million shares.

crypto_news.query: What are the most significant cryptocurrency and blockchain news from the past 24 hours? Include major price movements, regulatory news, and notable project developments.

items.title: Bitcoin Drops 2.6% to $90,600 Amid Trade Tensions and Macro Uncertainty
items.summary: Bitcoin fell 2.6% in the past 24 hours to a low of $90,600, erasing recent gains due to international trade pressures from Trump tariffs and rising gold prices as a safe haven. Ether declined 0.8% to $3,183, while XRP rose slightly 0.2% to $1.96; Crypto Fear & Greed Index dropped to 32 (Fear).[1][2][4][6]

items.title: NYSE Develops Tokenized U.S. Equities Platform for 24/7 Trading
items.summary: The New York Stock Exchange is building a tokenized platform for U.S. equities with 24/7 operations, instant settlement, dollar-denominated orders, and stablecoin transfers, marking a step toward hybrid finance.

items.title: Magic Eden Allocates 15% Revenue to ME Token Buybacks from February
items.summary: Magic Eden will direct 15% of revenue starting February 1 to buy back ME tokens and fund ecosystem development, estimating $20,000 monthly buybacks based on current revenue.

items.title: PancakeSwap Reduces CAKE Max Supply from 450M to 400M
items.summary: PancakeSwap community passed a proposal to cut CAKE's maximum supply from 450 million to 400 million tokens.

items.title: Bermuda Partners with Coinbase and Circle for On-Chain Economy Pilot
items.summary: Bermuda is collaborating with Coinbase and Circle to launch a fully on-chain national economy pilot.

items.title: CoinShares Reports $2.17B Net Inflows into Digital Assets Last Week
items.summary: Digital asset investment products saw net inflows of $2.17 billion last week, indicating strong institutional interest.

items.title: Ethereum Hits Record 2.89 Million Daily Transactions
items.summary: Ethereum's daily transaction count reached a new high of 2.89 million.

items.title: ZRO Token Unlock: 6.36% of Supply Worth $44.5M Released
items.summary: LayerZero's ZRO token unlock event released 6.36% of circulating supply, valued at approximately $44.5 million.

items.title: Crypto Perpetuals Surge in Popularity for 2026 Trading
items.summary: Crypto perpetual futures are gaining momentum as a key instrument in early 2026, offering high liquidity and 24/7 access amid maturing markets.

ai_news.query: What are the most important artificial intelligence and machine learning news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include new model releases, company announcements, research breakthroughs, and industry trends.

gaming.query: What are the most notable video game and gaming industry news from the past 24 hours? Include game releases, announcements, esports, and industry developments.

items.title: MIO: Memories in Orbit and Blightstone Launch Today
items.summary: Two highly anticipated titles released on January 20, 2026. MIO: Memories in Orbit is a narrative-driven adventure emphasizing exploration and storytelling, while Blightstone delivers fast-paced action with roguelike elements and procedural dungeon generation.

items.title: Strategos Strategic War Game Enters Early Access
items.summary: Strategos, a strategic war game allowing players to simulate large-scale battles, launched in early access on PC on January 20, 2026.

items.title: Xbox, PlayStation, and Nintendo Reaffirm Cross-Platform Safety Framework
items.summary: The three major console manufacturers renewed their commitment to player safety and online security, evolving a joint framework originally launched in 2020 to address emerging technologies and player behavior changes.

items.title: Microsoft Prepares Ad-Supported Xbox Cloud Gaming Tier
items.summary: Microsoft is developing an ad-supported Xbox Cloud Gaming plan for non-Game Pass subscribers, featuring two-minute pre-roll video ads and currently undergoing internal testing with employees.

items.title: Konami's Money in the Bank Slot Series Ranks No. 1 in New Casino Games
items.summary: Konami Gaming's Money in the Bank casino slot series achieved the top ranking for new core video reel games according to industry performance reports, featuring innovative 'shake the bank' and 'break the bank' mechanics.

items.title: AI Asset Creation Becoming Standard in Video Game Development
items.summary: The use of AI to create video game assets is increasingly common in 2026, particularly for concept art and placeholder textures.

tech_news.query: What are the most important technology news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major product launches, company news, and significant tech industry developments. Exclude AI-specific news.
